// RESTRICTED //
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.-I(Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated:  22/02/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.:01 /2013
Subject:Extension of the facility to take his own vehicle up to the tarmac during
his departure/arrival by air at all airports in the country
on
medicalgrounds 
in 
respect 
of 
Dr.Karan 
Singh, 
President,
IndianCouncil for Cultural Relations
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.04/2012 dated 31/01/2012 on the subject
cited above.
The permission to Dr.Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural
Relations is hereby extendedto take his own vehicle up to the tarmac during his
departure/arrival by air at all airports in the country on medical groundsfor a
further period beyond 18/02/2013 up to 30/06/2013.
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation).
(R.N.Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf.
Copy to:
MCA (Shri U.K. Bhatia, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi.: w.r.t. MCA letter dated
07/02/2013
